page.title: 11Kingfisher Shopping Centre.
page.content: I go{shopping}each Saturday with my mum, dad, and brother. We travel to Redditch by car and use{car park}3. As we enter the car park we take a ticket from a{machine}to raise the barrier. From the car park it is easy to walk{ {undercover}into the Kingfisher Centre. We enter Owen Owen's{department store from an open square with a frozen food shop, greengrocers, kitchen shop, jewellers and hairdressers. All the undercover{squares}have features; palm trees, mosaics or water sculptures. It makes the centre interesting. We shop at Sainsbury's for our food. This is the part I dread most as it tends to be boring. The one good thing is that there is always the chance that we will go to MacDonald's for a coffee or coke, or to Chelsea Girl for some clothes. When we leave the car park we give in the ticket and pay the fee.
